body.p: The affiliations of Christelle Hano, Giulia Bardino and Michel Saint Jalme are listed incorrectly. The correct affiliations are as follows:
Affiliation: Museum National d'Histoire Naturelle, UMR 7204, Ménagerie du Jardin des Plantes, Paris, France.
Affiliation: Museum National d'Histoire Naturelle, UMR 7206, Universita La Sapienza, Rome, Italy
Affiliation: Museum National d'Histoire Naturelle, UMR 7204, Ménagerie du Jardin des Plantes, Paris, France.
There is also an error in the author contributions. The listed roles for Shelly Masi should read as follows:
Roles: Conceptualization, Formal analysis, Funding acquisition, Investigation, Resources, Supervision, Writing–original draft, Writing–review & editing
